sentences.english: A full-bodied wine with a deep red, almost black, colour.
sentences.chinese: 深紅色幾近黑色，酒體飽滿。

sentences.english: The evening sky was suffused with crimson.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚的天空映滿了深紅色。

sentences.english: Garnet red colour with a few orange reflections.
sentences.chinese: 呈深紅色略帶橙色光暈。

sentences.english: And the marvellous rose became crimson, like the rose of the eastern sky.
sentences.chinese: 那奇蹟的玫瑰變成了深紅色，就像東方升起的太陽。

sentences.english: The author deep red, nearly spherical.
The wine is clear and bright crimson dress, splash dark purple halo.
sentences.chinese: 深紅色清澈而透亮的酒裙，閃現暗紫色光暈。

sentences.english: The all-steel box is deep red with the required signage "Fire Dept Use Only."
sentences.chinese: 鍵槽是全鋼，深紅色，並注有“火警專用”的標識。

sentences.english: Fung zau are typically dark red in color.
sentences.chinese: 深紅色是鳳爪的代表色。

sentences.english: Smoothing as the diving into the sea, this Australian Merlot is a deeper, brilliant red.
sentences.chinese: 這款梅洛葡萄酒口感平滑順口，色澤爲明亮的深紅色。

sentences.english: A layer of low clouds creates the dark red line along the lower part of the profile.
sentences.chinese: 一層低空雲層在剖面圖的下方形成了深紅色的線。

sentences.english: Its dark-red mass was like something that had just been splodged out of a tin.
sentences.chinese: 這深紅色的一大片就像被罐頭弄髒了的一塊污漬。

sentences.english: A variety of the corn poppy having scarlet, pink, or salmon flowers.
sentences.chinese: 一個虞美人品種，有深紅色，粉色或淺橙色的花。

sentences.english: The clothes was blotched with dark red stains.
This crab is characterized by its deep red shell and black tipped pincers.
sentences.chinese: 這螃蟹特點是由其深紅色殼和黑色傾斜鉗子。

sentences.english: There are dark red celebratory curtains hanging in the hall of the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這家酒店大廳裏掛着深紅色的喜幛。
